Launched in 2020, Scandal A Paris is a lighter, more playful interpretation of the original Scandal perfume. Created by legendary designer Jean Paul Gaultier, this fragrance continues his tradition of pushing boundaries in both fashion and perfumery. The iconic leg-shaped bottle represents the duality of feminine power â€“ elegance and sensuality combined in one stunning package.

Frequently Asked Question

What is the difference between Scandal and Scandal A Paris?

While both fragrances share similar DNA, Scandal A Paris Eau De Toilette is a lighter, more daytime-appropriate version of the original Scandal Eau De Parfum. The Paris edition features brighter citrus top notes, a more prominent floral heart, and a softer honey-caramel base. The EDT concentration makes it perfect for everyday wear, while still maintaining the distinctive character that made the original Scandal A Paris so beloved.
